title: alaiyAdE pEi nenjamE
sahitya:
alaiyAdE pEi nenjamE ADi mEgham pOl kalaiyAdE maDa nenjamE


anupallavi

  ulagellAm tirindAlum uNmai viLangAdu kalaiyellAm kaTrAlum karuttum teriyAdu


caraNam    pala pala vaghaiyAgap-paranda pArakamellAm panca bhUta vikAram pArttadai mayangAdE
malai pOlE unnuLLE nilai perat-tayangAdE mAya mayakkugaLil pAindu muyangiDa nI
